page.description: Returns a dot variable with info about a 5 digit zip code.
page.prototype: Result as P = zipcodeinfo(zip5 as C)

return.name: Result
return.description: Returns information about the zip code in a dot variable with the following properties:

property.name: area_code
property.description: The area code for the specified zip code.

property.name: time_zone
property.description: The timezone for the specified zip code.

page.discussion: The zipcodeinfo() function looks up location information for the specified 5-digit US zip code.
page.example: ? zipcodeinfo("90210") = area_code = "310" city = "Beverly Hills" state = "CA" time_zone = "P" zip = "90210"
